block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: NeoPixel - neopixel Pin - LED NeoPixel need to be initialize before it can operate - set the Pin connected to neopixel - set the number of LED
LED - 1 255 - 50 set brightness of LED - 1 to 255 - default brightness is 50
LED need to run this to stop the running LED
- set color of number of pixel selected and run with delay in seconds - it will run forever
Neopixel RGB - RGB RRGGBB set RGB color of selected number of pixel - value of RGB is RRGGBB in hexademical
RGB - RGB RRGGBB set RGB color of all pixels - value of RGB is RRGGBB in hexademical

custom-block.comment: fill all LED with selected color

scripts.comment: Neopixel - LED set all the neopixel to selected color - only affect number of LED defined
- 12 / 18 / 24 / 36 steps use Color Wheel to get a full color range with number of steps - 12 / 18 / 24 / 36 steps
- 12 / 18 / 24 / 36 steps use Color Wheel to get a full color range with number of steps - 12 / 18 / 24 / 36 steps
